Primary Contact: Carly Gronlund, First Link/Support & Education Coordinator, North & Central Okanagan; Email: cgronlund@alzheimerbc.org
Primary Executive: Maribeth Friesen, Manager, North & Central Okanagan; Email: mfriesen@alzheimerbc.org
Service Details: Helps those concerned about or coping with dementia build the knowledge, skills, and confidence to maintain quality of life by offering information, educational opportunities, support groups, First Link program, Minds in Motion, one-to-one support and the ability to speak directly with a knowledgeable team member
Hours: - Please call ahead for an appointment - Drop-in is offered Wed: 3:00pm - 5:00pm
How to Apply: Contact the Alzheimer Society of BC's Kelowna Resource Centre
